sentences.en: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
sentences.cn: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

sentences.en: A plane with Danish markings was over-flying his vessel.
sentences.cn: 一架带有丹麦标记的飞机从他的船上空飞过。

sentences.en: All the sailors disembarked from the vessel and went to town.
sentences.cn: 水手们都下船去城里了.

sentences.en: He loaded his vessel with another cargo and set sail.
sentences.cn: 他给自己的船装上另一批货后便启航了。

sentences.en: He was accused of operating the vessel while drunk.
More and more frequently the vessel lurched into a sudden roll.
sentences.cn: 船不时会猛烈摇晃一下，而且越来越频繁。

sentences.en: The British navy boarded the vessel and towed it to New York.
sentences.cn: 英国海军登上船，把它拖到纽约。

sentences.en: The doctor said I'd severed a vessel in my leg.
sentences.cn: 医生说我割断了腿上的一根血管.

sentences.en: The French vessel has a commanding lead.
the rupture of a blood vessel
The vessel docked at Liverpool in April 1811.
sentences.cn: 这艘轮船于1811年4月在利物浦靠岸。

sentences.en: The vessel yesterday reached anchorage off Dubai.
sentences.cn: 船昨天到达了迪拜附近的泊地。

sentences.en: The vessel's safety equipment was not in good order.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的安全设备破损失修。

sentences.en: We had sighted the vessel and were following it.
sentences.cn: 我们已看到那船并在跟随着它.

phrases.tran_cn: 反应堆槽；反应堆容器；反应堆压力外壳

trans.tran_cn: 容器，船，飞船，血管，管束，…的化身
